Based on the previous editions of the Convergences World Forum, Convergences gathered a 100 solutions for a Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty world.

These 100 solutions show concrete ways of tackling social and environmental challenges, by putting the spotlight on innovative solutions for a successful transition toward sustainable territories.

This interactive collection of a 100 solutions will soon be turned into a real web platform where new tools and solutions will be added.

The solutions are classified by the SDGs they contribute to and by the “Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty” goal they cover. They are meant to show that the Sustainable Development Goals and our 3Zero Objective are achievable if all actors take action at their own level.
